New Records: Anthony Edwards set a career-high in 3-point attempts and made 3-pointers during the game.
The Minnesota Timberwolves secured their third-straight win, improving to 6-3 on the season.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored a game-high 37 points, connecting on nine of his 15 3-point attempts.
Edwards' consistent 3-point shooting has been a key factor in the team's success this season.
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Edwards expressed frustration at teams not respecting him from the 3-point range before the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Edwards commented on his performance, stating, 'I'm gonna keep shooting this b***h. I don't know what they're doing, but I'm gonna keep lacing that b***h.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edwards' improved 3-point shooting has been a significant highlight of the 2024-25 season, especially after the loss of Karl-Anthony Towns.
